alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Dale; Geneva; Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 9:54AM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Dale, Coffee, eastern Geneva and central Houston Counties through 1030 AM CDT... At 953 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles southwest of Antioch to Daleville to 6 miles southeast of Hartford. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Daleville, Elba, Cottonwood, Geneva, Enterprise, Dothan, Fort Rucker, Ozark, Hartford, Taylor, Midland City, Kinsey, Level Plains, Slocomb, Cowarts, Newton, Webb, New Brockton, Ariton and Pinckard. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 PM CDT for southeastern Alabama...and the Panhandle of Florida.
